about_the_game:
"SKY THE SCRAPER" is a Roguelike Action game where you play as a young man named Sky, chasing uncertain dreams while working as a high-rise cleaner.
*Please note that this trial version is only available for the duration of the Bit Summit Let's GO!! event. After July 17th (Sunday) Japan Standard Time, you will no longer be able to play, so please be aware.

Thrilling High-rise Cleaning Action

Strive to remove as much grime as possible within the time limit for better rewards and reviews. Use wire and wall movements for quick, precise cleaning. Remember, frequent wiper cleaning is vital for optimal performance.



If Sky loses suction, falls from the edge of the building, or collides with birds, he will fall. Falling to the ground ends the day's work and potentially leads to game-over injuries. Safety first!

Ever-changing Challenges

No two job scenes are alike, varying in grime types & layouts, weather, time of day, and obstacles. Always assess and adapt to the situation.


Survive Day by Day

Work on workdays, perform activities on days off, and maintain a balance in your daily life. You'll have to choose your shift from the company's options, but still how you spend your time is ultimately up to you.



Upgrade Your Abilities

Enhance your abilities by upgrading your cleaning equipment. As your ambition grows, you can learn new skills with the "Skill Synapse" feature. Build your optimal setup and enhance your performance.


Sky's Relationships and Challenges

Interactions with various characters impact Sky's life. Sometimes, you may have to give up your dream if you can't complete tasks. Try to survive the two-month period until you determine your path by fulfilling requirements such as money, ambition, and trust.

Plenty of Replay Elements

Sky's ending varies depending on how you spend the two months. Depending on the ending reached, new stories, game modes, or player characters with different skill sets may emerge. The world of "SKY THE SCRAPER" expands and deepens the more you play.




Reach out, and you will surely reach it someday. Please guide Sky's future that awaits beyond these challenging days.

name: SKY THE SCRAPER DEMO
short_description: This is a building cleaning Roguelike action game, about a young man named Sky, who chases uncertain dreams as a building cleaner. Conquer randomly changing stages, upgrade skills and gear with your money and will, and find your path within two months. *Demo version ends on day 21st.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
